title: Not all downhill as China spends on winter sports
text:
Not all downhill as China spends on winter sports 8:02am EST - 01:52 
This year's winter Olympics may be about to start in South Korea but China is preparing for the 2022 Olympics. As Sonia Legg reports, it's spending big on its winter sports industry as it moves into a more services-focused economy, and it's not all downhill.
